record1.<1>:
Declare Function ListNoteServers
Declare Subroutine GiveDirect, Utility, CreateTab

$Insert Notesman_Equates

InitSelect = 1 
str = "Forms":@fm:"Views":@fm:"Shared Fields":char(0)

CreateTab(.->handle, 8, 220, 330, 147, str, InitSelect, .axl_edl->handle)

MDISize = CreateParam
DlgSize = .->size
DlgSize<1> = MDISize<1> + (MDISize<3> - DlgSize<3>)/2
DlgSize<2> = MDISize<2> + (MDISize<4> - DlgSize<4>)/2
.->size = DlgSize

Utility("CURSOR", "H")

If ListNoteServers(@user0) Then
	 @user0 = "":@fm:@user0  
End

templist = @user0
templist<1> = "Local"
Swap "CN=" with "" in templist
Swap "O="  with "" in templist
.combo_1->list = templist
.combo_1->selpos = 1
.combo_1->changed = TRUE$

If .text_1->text Ne "" Then
	.text_1->text = ""
	.list_3->list = ""
	.edit->enabled = FALSE$
End
	
dirct = @user4<.list_2->selpos>
dpath = dirct
server = @user0<.combo_1->selpos>

GiveDirect(server, dpath, @user1, @user2, @user3, @user4, 1)    
.list_1->list = @user1
.list_2->list = @user3 

Convert @UPPER.CASE to @LOWER.CASE in dirct	 
pos = count(dirct, "\")
If dirct[-1, 1] = "." Then		 
	offs = Len(field(dirct, "\", pos)) + 4
	dirct[-offs, offs] = ""  
End
	
Loop While Len(dirct) > 21 And pos do	  
	Swap "\...\" with "" in dirct   
	dirct[1, Len(field(dirct, "\", 1))] = "\..."	      	    
Repeat

.text_2->text = dirct 
@recur3 = 1
Utility("CURSOR", "A")
  
RETURN 0
